Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="Command"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Function" Type="System.String" Value="Account.InformAddRemoveService"/> <Attribute Name="Msisdn" Type="System.String" Value="##msisdn##"/> </Attributes> <DataTable Name="serviceActions"> <Columns> <Column Name="Action" Type="System.Byte"/> <Column Name="ServiceCode" Type="System.String"/> </Columns> <Rows> <Row Action="1" ServiceCode="##ServiceName##"/> </Rows> </DataTable> </DataSet>
